Sound

Kraft

• Our playlist

New Album Available Now

At Soundkraft, we don’t just listen to music—we live it. Our mission is simple: to bring authentic sounds and experiences to audiences everywhere. From emerging local artists to established icons, we’re here to amplify the music that moves you. Dive into the world of Poize, where every beat tells a story and every note sparks a connection.

Follow on Spotify

Blue Moon

Ask and Receive

Battle With Myself

Leader

Spoils of Rhythm

Carefree Fight
